definition: to spin (cotton or hemp etc)/fine woven silk fabric
"cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 27), occurring in 原, 历, 压 etc

sentences.english: The women who work with textiles steal thread so they can make their own clothes.
sentences.chinese: 纺织厂工作的女人会偷线来给自己做衣服。

sentences.english: Its 1950s-era textile mills are laying off workers.
sentences.chinese: 五十年代修建的纺织厂的工人们纷纷下岗。

sentences.english: Trial Discussion of Saving Measures of Assistant Production Electricity of Textile Mill;
sentences.chinese: 探讨纺织厂辅助生产用电的节约措施。

sentences.english: This paper suggests a microcomputer system for the technical design of woollen mills.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了微型机毛纺织厂工艺设计系统。

sentences.english: He wrote a meritorious theme about his visit to the cotton mill.
sentences.chinese: 他写了一篇关于参观棉纺织厂的有价值的论文。

sentences.english: Design attention points of air-cooled oil-lubricated air compressor in textile mill are also proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了纺织厂风冷有油空压机系统的设计注意要点。

sentences.english: In the local textile mills or in farming, these jobs were passed from one generation to the next.
sentences.chinese: 在当地的纺织厂或在农场里，工作岗位一代传一代。

sentences.english: Pure cotton yarn of polyester cotton textile mills began to spin, and other blended.
sentences.chinese: 一些纺纯棉纱的纺织厂开始转纺涤棉等其他混纺。

sentences.english: Xuzhou textile mills overhauls Li Zhixin of group group leader to begin to consider a rust remover to come.
sentences.chinese: 徐州纺织厂检修组组长李志新开始琢磨起除锈机来了。

sentences.english: The women who work with textiles stenos threadvertisement so they can make their own clothes.
sentences.chinese: 纺织厂工做的女人会偷线往给本身做衣服。

sentences.english: Is this where our road turns off for the textile mill ?
sentences.chinese: 到纺织厂去的路是从这儿拐弯吗？

sentences.english: It resembled a cross between a lunatic asylum and a cotton mill.
sentences.chinese: 它像是疯人院和棉纺织厂的混合体。

sentences.english: In textile plant, double T-beam has been gradually applied.
sentences.chinese: 在新型纺织厂房内，双T板逐步得到应用。

sentences.english: A big textile factory eight miles from the city was still operating.
sentences.chinese: 离城八英里的一家大纺织厂还在开工。

definition: "cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 27), occurring in 原, 历, 压 etc
